hero.subtitle: maemo is an exclusive business consultancy that proactively identifies high-potential enterprises and provides strategic tools to realize their growth potential.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.subtitle: Four pillars of strategic analysis that guide our selective partnership process.

market.title: Market Position
market.description: Analysis of competitive landscape, market share, and strategic positioning within the sector.

financial.title: Financial Health
financial.description: Assessment of financial structures, cash flow optimization, and capital efficiency.

growth.title: Growth Potential
growth.description: Identification of expansion opportunities, scalability factors, and untapped market segments.

digital.title: Digital Presence
digital.description: Evaluation of digital infrastructure, online visibility, and technology stack optimization.

contact.title: Convince us
contact.subtitle: How it works

invited.title: Invited
invited.description: If we've reached out to you, we've already done our research. We see potential and want to explore if there's a fit.

signal.title: Take your shot
signal.description: Not approached by us? Pitch us anyway. We may respond when we see potential.

contact.disclaimer: We don't always respond. If you don't hear from us, we're likely at capacity or not the right match. No response is also a response.
